alert.note: Alert for Huron; Sanilac; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 7:54PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tuscola, northern Sanilac and southern Huron Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 753 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pigeon, or 9 miles northeast of Sebewaing, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Gagetown around 805 PM EDT. Cass City around 810 PM EDT. Ubly around 815 PM EDT. Argyle around 825 PM EDT. Deckerville around 840 PM EDT. Carsonville around 850 PM EDT. Port Sanilac around 855 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Parisville, McGregor, White Rock, Ivanhoe, Bay Port, New Greenleaf, Ruth, Tyre, Palms and Forester. People attending Huron County Fairgrounds should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
